installer.script: Get-Process -Name KeePass -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -Verbose; Copy-Item "$dir\MSWifiImportPlugin.dll" "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins\MSWifiImportPlugin.dll"; KeePass

uninstaller.script: Get-Process -Name KeePass -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -Verbose; Remove-Item "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins\MSWifiImportPlugin.dll" -Force; KeePass
